Container.Name: Plex DB Merge
Container.Overview: Merge data from a corrupt Plex database into an older good backup. Web UI to compare and merge watch history, settings, and optionally new library items. Uses bundled SQLite with .recover support.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Plex DB Merge web interface port.

Config.Name: Data (Plex DB path)
Config.Description: Host path to folder containing your Plex DBs (e.g. appdata/plex or Plex Media Server Plug-in Support/Databases). In the UI set Start browse at to /data.

Config.Name: BROWSE_ROOT
Config.Description: Browse root for file picker (match the Data path).

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Run container as this user ID (Unraid default 99).

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Run container as this group ID (Unraid default 100).
